cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hou

sentence.kanji: 彼は私の方を見ました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha watashi no hou wo mimashita
sentence.english: He looked at me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurai

sentence.kanji: 東の空が暗いです。
sentence.romaji: higashi no sora ga kurai desu
sentence.english: The eastern sky is dark.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's higashi

sentence.kanji: 東の空が暗いです。
sentence.romaji: higashi no sora ga kurai desu
sentence.english: The eastern sky is dark.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iikata

sentence.kanji: そんな言い方をしてはいけません。
sentence.romaji: sonna iikata wo shite ha ikemasen
sentence.english: You mustn't talk like that.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ipou

sentence.kanji: ここは一方通行です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha ipou tsuukou desu
sentence.english: This is a one-way street.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yomikata

sentence.kanji: この漢字の読み方を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: kono kanji no yomikata wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me how to read this Chinese character.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fueru

sentence.kanji: この町は人口が増えた。
sentence.romaji: kono machi ha jinkou ga fueta
sentence.english: The population has increased in this town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuugata

sentence.kanji: 夕方そちらに着きます。
sentence.romaji: yuugata sochira ni tsukimasu
sentence.english: I'll arrive there in the evening.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kata

sentence.kanji: 次の方、どうぞ。
sentence.romaji: tsugi no kata douzo
sentence.english: Next please.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oto

sentence.kanji: 雨の音が聞こえる。
sentence.romaji: ame no oto ga kikoeru
sentence.english: I can hear the sound of rain.

cards.english: sound, speech sound, Chinese pronunciation of a character
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oto

sentence.kanji: このピアノは音があまり良くない。
sentence.romaji: kono piano ha oto ga amari yoku nai
sentence.english: That piano's sound isn't very good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's makura

sentence.kanji: 外は真っ暗です。
sentence.romaji: soto ha makura desu
sentence.english: It's pitch-dark outside.

cards.english: how to write, way of writing
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakikata

sentence.kanji: 彼はその漢字の書き方が分からない。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sono kanji no kakikata ga wakaranai
sentence.english: He doesn't know how to write that Chinese character.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mikata

sentence.kanji: 彼に対する見方が変わりました。
sentence.romaji: kare ni taisuru mikata ga kawarimashita
sentence.english: My view of him has changed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakunaru

sentence.kanji: おととい、昔の友人が亡くなった。
sentence.romaji: ototoi mukashi no yuujin ga nakunata
sentence.english: An old friend died the day before yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's setsumei

sentence.kanji: この単語の意味を説明してください。
sentence.romaji: kono tango no imi wo setsumei shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me the meaning of this word.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kooru

sentence.kanji: 寒い朝は道路が凍ります。
sentence.romaji: samui asa ha douro ga koorimasu
sentence.english: The roads freeze on cold mornings.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otozureru

sentence.kanji: 私は夏に京都を訪れました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha natsu ni kyouto wo otozuremashita
sentence.english: I visited Kyoto this summer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tazuneru

sentence.kanji: 彼はニューヨークの友達を訪ねた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nyu-yo-ku no tomodachi wo tazuneta
sentence.english: He visited his friend in New York.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuyasu

sentence.kanji: あの町は緑を増やしています。
sentence.romaji: ano machi ha midori wo fuyashite imasu
sentence.english: That town is increasing its greenery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shousetsu

sentence.kanji: 私は月に3冊くらい小説を読みます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha tsuki ni sansatsu kurai shousetsu wo yomimasu
sentence.english: I read about three novels a month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houkou

sentence.kanji: あの人たちは皆、同じ方向を見ている。
sentence.romaji: ano hitotachi ha mina onaji houkou wo mite iru
sentence.english: Those people are all looking in the same direction.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okuru

sentence.kanji: 母に花を贈った。
sentence.romaji: haha ni hana wo okuta
sentence.english: I sent my mother some flowers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hageshii

sentence.kanji: 激しい雨が降っています。
sentence.romaji: hageshii ame ga fute imasu
sentence.english: A very heavy rain is falling.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houshin

sentence.kanji: 今後の方針が決まった。
sentence.romaji: kongo no houshin ga kimata
sentence.english: We've decided our future policy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kagami

sentence.kanji: 彼女は鏡を見て髪を直した。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kagami wo mite kami wo naoshita
sentence.english: She looked in the mirror and tidied her hair.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nugu

sentence.kanji: 靴を脱いでください。
sentence.romaji: kutsu wo nuide kudasai
sentence.english: Please take off your shoes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenpou

sentence.kanji: 前方に山が見えますね。
sentence.romaji: zenpou ni yama ga miemasu ne
sentence.english: We can see the mountain ahead.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shihou

sentence.kanji: 火が四方に広がったんだよ。
sentence.romaji: hi ga shihou ni hirogata n da yo
sentence.english: The fire has spread in all directions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hokutou

sentence.kanji: 町の北東に山があります。
sentence.romaji: machi no hokutou ni yama ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a mountain to the northeast of the town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mekata

sentence.kanji: この荷の目方は70キロってとこかね。
sentence.romaji: kono ni no mekata ha 70 kiro te toko ka ne
sentence.english: I guess the weight of this load is about 70 kilograms.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yarikata

sentence.kanji: 仕事のやり方を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: shigoto no yarikata wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please teach me how to do the job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's masu

sentence.kanji: 大雨で川の水かさが増しているな。
sentence.romaji: ooame de kawa no mizukasa ga mashite iru na
sentence.english: The river swells because of the downpour.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zoudai

sentence.kanji: 生産コスト増大のため、値上げします。
sentence.romaji: seisan kosuto zoudai no tame neage shimasu
sentence.english: Prices are rising because production costs are increasing.

cards.english: increase and decrease, rise and fall
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zougen

sentence.kanji: この数年、体重は増減していません。
sentence.romaji: kono suunen taijuu ha zougen shite imasen
sentence.english: My weight has not increased or decreased for several years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akegata

sentence.kanji: 明け方に雨が降り始めましたね。
sentence.romaji: akegata ni ame ga furihajimemashita ne
sentence.english: It began to rain at dawn.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's onyomi

sentence.kanji: この漢字の音読みは何ですか。
sentence.romaji: kono kanji no onyomi ha nan desu ka
sentence.english: What's the Chinese-derived reading of this kanji?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mikata

sentence.kanji: 母はいつも私の味方です。
sentence.romaji: haha ha itsumo watashi no mikata desu
sentence.english: My mother always looks out for me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hougen

sentence.kanji: 彼は方言で話します。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hougen de hanashimasu
sentence.english: He speaks in a dialect.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakusu

sentence.kanji: 昨年、友人を亡くしました。
sentence.romaji: sakunen yuujin wo nakushimashita
sentence.english: I lost my friend last year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakusetsu

sentence.kanji: それは最新の学説ね。
sentence.romaji: sore ha saishin no gakusetsu ne
sentence.english: It is the latest theory.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's setsu

sentence.kanji: 私は彼の説が正しいと思う。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare no setsu ga tadashii to omou
sentence.english: I think that his theory is correct.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houbou

sentence.kanji: 彼の連絡先を方々に問い合わせたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare no renrakusaki wo houbou ni toiawaseta n da
sentence.english: I inquired everywhere for his contact information.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakai

sentence.kanji: 2つの市の境に川が流れているの。
sentence.romaji: futatsu no shi no sakai ni kawa ga nagarete iru no
sentence.english: A river flows along the boundary of the two cities.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyoukai

sentence.kanji: ここは隣の市との境界です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha tonari no shi to no kyoukai desu
sentence.english: Here is the border with the neighboring city.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gojuuon

sentence.kanji: 名前は五十音順に並んでいます。
sentence.romaji: namae ha gojuuonjun ni narande imasu
sentence.english: The names are arranged in the order of the Japanese syllabary.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's usugurai

sentence.kanji: 外はもう薄暗くなりましたよ。
sentence.romaji: soto ha mou usuguraku narimashita yo
sentence.english: It is already getting dark outside.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nozomu

sentence.kanji: 彼は私との結婚を望んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha watashi to no kekon wo nozonde imasu
sentence.english: He wants to marry me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nozomashii

sentence.kanji: 夜は10時までに寝るのが望ましいの。
sentence.romaji: yoru ha 10 ji made ni neru no ga nozomashii no
sentence.english: It's recommended to go to sleep by ten o'clock at night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuubou

sentence.kanji: 彼は有望な社員です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yuubou na shain desu
sentence.english: He's a promising employee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houru

sentence.kanji: ボールを空中に放ったの。
sentence.romaji: bo-ru wo kuuchuu ni houta no
sentence.english: I threw the ball in the air.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanasu

sentence.kanji: 公園で犬を放したの。
sentence.romaji: kouen de inu wo hanashita no
sentence.english: I let my dog run freely in the park.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shigeki

sentence.kanji: そのクイズ番組は脳を刺激するね。
sentence.romaji: sono kuizubangumi ha nou wo shigeki suru ne
sentence.english: The quiz show stimulates the brain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toku

sentence.kanji: 彼は非暴力を説きました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hibouryoku wo tokimashita
sentence.english: He preached nonviolence.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katagata

sentence.kanji: 大勢の方々にご出席いただきました。
sentence.romaji: oozei no katagata ni goshuseki itadakimashita
sentence.english: It was attended by a lot of people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ne

sentence.kanji: 秋は虫の音が心地良いです。
sentence.romaji: aki ha mushi no ne ga kokochiii desu
sentence.english: The chirping of insects in fall feels comfortable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shibou

sentence.kanji: お腹の脂肪を取りたい。
sentence.romaji: onaka no shibou wo toritai
sentence.english: I want to get rid of the fat on my belly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nozomi

sentence.kanji: 私の望みは海外で暮らすことです。
sentence.romaji: watashi no nozomi ha kaigai de kurasu koto desu
sentence.english: It's my wish to live abroad.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's areru

sentence.kanji: 台風で山も海も荒れています。
sentence.romaji: taifuu de yama mo umi mo arete imasu
sentence.english: Because of the typhoon, the weather is rough both on the mountains and in the ocean.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arai

sentence.kanji: 彼は金遣いが荒いな。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kanezukai ga arai na
sentence.english: He spends money recklessly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arai

sentence.kanji: うちの犬は気が荒い。
sentence.romaji: uchi no inu ha ki ga arai
sentence.english: Our dog is bad-tempered.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arasu

sentence.kanji: 彼は強盗に家の中を荒されたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha goutou ni ie no naka wo arasareta no
sentence.english: His house was ransacked by a burglar.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's obousan

sentence.kanji: お寺からお坊さんが出て来ましたよ。
sentence.romaji: otera kara obousan ga dete kimashita yo
sentence.english: The priest came out of the temple.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bousan

sentence.kanji: 私の友人はお坊さんをしているの。
sentence.romaji: watashi no yuujin ha obousan wo shite iru no
sentence.english: My friend works as a priest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saibai

sentence.kanji: この地方ではみかんの栽培が盛んです。
sentence.romaji: kono chihou de ha mikan no saibai ga sakan desu
sentence.english: Mandarin orange cultivation is well developed in this region.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's surudoi

sentence.kanji: 鋭い刃物で指を怪我した。
sentence.romaji: surudoi hamono de yubi wo kega shita
sentence.english: I injured my finger on the sharp knife.
